body_html:
@ebrevdo

That's a pretty good idea. I'll take a shot at it.

In the meantime can you take a look at the code I posted at #3738 (comment) and let me know if can see any issue with this looping approach?

I'm really interested in debugging this error, but at this point the TensorFlow internals are still a bit confusing to me.

body:
@ebrevdo

That's a pretty good idea. I'll take a shot at it.

In the meantime can you take a look at the code I posted at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/3738#issuecomment-241531134 and let me know if can see any issue with this looping approach?

I'm really interested in debugging this error, but at this point the TensorFlow internals are still a bit confusing to me.
